comments.body: it's not clear in this sentence until what is done.
Yeah, I'm a little confused why `run-in-gopath` in still needed.

Our tree has multiple `go.mod` in it.  We're making a tool that does filesystem walk, which ignores go.mod.  These are not compatible,

We have to choose - we can ignore go.mod, in which case it has to be under a GOPATH or we can respect go.mod which requires that we run this tool multiple times against each module (or something, TBD).

I chose to rewrite to go/packages first.  Hence GOPATH
I'd suggest to expand the comment a little bit. When reading it out of context it's unclear what this `Until that` refers to =). Maybe "Until it works well with multiple modules,"
